pkgmetadata.longdescription: Principal Components Lasso // A method for fitting the entire regularization path of the principal components lasso for linear and logistic regression models. The algorithm uses cyclic coordinate descent in a path-wise fashion. See URL below for more information on the algorithm. See Tay, K., Friedman, J. ,Tibshirani, R., (2014) 'Principal component-guided sparse regression' arXiv:1810.04651.
